author: Special Correspondent
text:
The members of the NSS, Youth Red Cross and Red Ribbon Club of the Rajaji Polytechnic College donated blood at a voluntary blood donation camp held on the polytechnic premises recently. M. V. Rangarajan, Correspondent of the polytechnic college, inaugurated the camp in the presence of Badrinathan, Principal. A team of doctors and para-medical staff from the Blood Bank of the Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital, led by Ravindran, Blood Bank Officer, collected the blood on the occasion.

Later, a blood donation awareness seminar was held, when Dr. Ravindran explained how voluntary blood donation helped in saving many precious lives. He said that donating blood will in no way affect the health of the donor and called upon the students to come forward to donate blood whenever possible.
title: Students urged to donate blood
